text: Sunsweet Growers is an American agricultural marketing cooperative. It was founded in 1917 as the California Prune and Apricot Growers Association. It manufactures a variety of dried fruit and juice products, although it is best known for prunes. It is headquartered in Yuba City, California. Category:American food companies Category:1917 establishments in the United States
title: Sunsweet Growers
